notes.title: **Valentoon's Day**
points: Rose S.R. Redd is back! It seems that toons around town haven't been receiving their flower deliveries, and Rose could use some help!
- Use code "LOVESTRUCK" to be awarded an exclusive background for Valentoon's Day!

notes.title: **Lawbot Stand-In**
points: Possible fix for a rare crashing issue during the cannon round
Fixed odd behavior from flying cogs in the cannon round
Fix an issue with incorrect Lawbot department experience being awarded for solo stunning

notes.title: **Misc**
points: Added more clothing colors and types to clothing stores
